sewer-rat.name: Sewer Rat
intro-text:
Hey, rat. . . you dead??
*You let out a groan...*
What are you doing?!?
Don't you know it's crazy to sleep so close to the recruits' camp?
A guard will come down those stairs soon enough and catch you!

You'll end up being drafted! You better come back in.
By the way, what's your name?

recruit.name: Recruit
intro-text:
Hey... you alive?
*You let out a groan...*
Hey, mate, you need to wake up.
The guards will be coming 'round soon, and they put a spear through the last guy they

found still asleep.
*Slowly, you sit up.*
That's the way! I'm going to head back up.

Follow me as soon as you can.
By the way, I'm Thorall. What's your name?
